Start with Issuing See also Connect for powering platform payments Financial Accounts for platforms Capital for platforms Issuing Connect Treasury Capital Global scale The backbone for global commerce Stripe makes moving money as easy and programmable as moving data.
            Our teams are based in offices around the world and we process hundreds of billions of dollars each year for ambitious businesses of all sizes. 500M+ API requests per day, peaking at 13,000 requests a second. 99.999% historical uptime for Stripe services . 47+ countries with local acquiring. 135+ currencies and payment methods supported. Support for any business type From global AI companies to category-defining marketplaces, successful businesses across industries grow and scale with Stripe. AI Stripe supports businesses across the AI ecosystem – from usage-based billing for AI assistants like Perplexity to premium subscriptions for infrastructure providers like OpenAI. Learn more OpenAI logo CursorAlt logo Anthropic logo SaaS Quickly launch and grow recurring revenue with a unified platform for payments, subscriptions, invoicing, tax, accounting, and more. Learn more BloomNation logo Instacart logo Deliveroo logo Embedded finance Distribute financial accounts, commercial cards and lending to create tailored in-product experiences for your customers. Learn more Glossier logo Dermalogica logo Indochino logo Crypto Embed crypto purchases directly into your checkout flow – with fraud prevention and authorisation optimisation built in. Get expert integration guidance from our professional services team and certified partners , and connect Stripe to Salesforce, SAP, and more through the Stripe App Marketplace . We obsess over the maze of gateways, payments rails, and financial institutions that make up the global economic landscape so that your teams can build what you need on one platform.
